name: 驱逐之剑(Jack And Lucy)
description:
Nostalgic art film style, horizontal version of arcade, action role play.
You will play you as a primary school student. During the summer vacation, in a real town, you will use toy made weapons to form gangs with your friends and fight with other gangs.
The game includes 9 levels, each area has several scenes and monsters, each area has a boss war, each area has its own unique story;
The game also includes a variety of weapons, equipment, props to choose from, and can be obtained from merchants or monsters;
There are 5 classes to choose from in the game. Each class has its own initial equipment, but all characters can wear weapons of other classes by adding points freely;
The game has 5 races to choose and customize characters, each race has its own race talent;
The game also includes a skill system, which allows the character to use powerful skills to tackle the level, but requires the character to use different adding schemes.
